data.title: The Perfect Pig
data.meta_description: The Perfect Pig Gourmet Market is the (ahem) perfect blend of exquisite local cuisine and foodie fantasy land. Come and dine! Come and shop! Come have a drink with us!
data.text:
Gourmet Southern Food with a Twist

The Perfect Pig Grill and Fish House features fresh local grouper for dinner, award-winning pulled pork for lunch and hand sliced applewood smoked bacon for breakfast.

We are annually awarded Trip Advisorâ€™s Certificate of Excellence and we were recently voted one of the hottest spots on 30A.

From our family to yours, we invite you to join us morning, noon or night for exceptional food and outstanding service in a beautiful and relaxed setting.

Check out the newest article about us on 30A.com! Written by the lovely Carrie Honaker, you can check her out on twitter and instagram @writeonhonaker. Thank you Carrie!

https://30a.com/the-perfect-pig/

See us on The Travel Channel!
